lead_paragraph: The president-elect, who as a candidate repeatedly seized on reports of long waits for doctor visits, met with several executives of private hospital systems.

headline.print_headline: Trump Mulls  Plan to Let  Veterans  Bypass V.A.
headline.main: Trump Weighs Letting Veterans Opt Out of V.A. Medical Care

snippet: The president-elect, who as a candidate repeatedly seized on reports of long waits for doctor visits, met with several executives of private hospital systems....
